reviews.review: Otimo game, porem sem muitas pessoas jogando a noite
A very fun, exciting and rewarding game. Give some hours into this game and it pays off.

Having played this game since just before the 'Nightmare on Elm Street' DLC I have absolutely loved the game thus far. Although I have come across my fair share of toxic killers and even survivors, (Survivor main). But the game is thoroughly enjoyable and have actually made great friends through out my games of Dead by Daylight.

This game is pretty good, but the fact that bugs are common drags it down the slope a lot
Fun game, especially at higher ranks. The majority of people are very friendly compared to other online games. If you want to pick up a game to play with friends, this game is a very good option.
